text: foreign [Music] eternity [Music] [Music] foreign [Applause] [Music] [Music] foreign field of in North Carolina in September another beautiful Harvest day here in Hampton Farms Canon country we're gonna catch a tractor as it comes by and then I'm going to step in behind it these are Virginia type peanuts that we grow Hampton farms for in shells the best the best in shell peanuts around had a great growing season this year so uh let's watch the tractor come by foreign as you can see these peanuts grow under the ground and what our farmer is doing right now is what's called a peanut Digger and they dig them up out of the ground and it inverts them throws them up to the sunlight for two or three days where they do some field drying and in about 72 hours it'll probably be in here with the peanut combine and pick the pick the pods off the vines and put into a drying trailer so this is absolutely a beautiful crop here
